Sentencas: In this study, alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 powders are synthesized by the gel autocombustion method.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of alkaline earth metals doped Nd2Ce2O7 on the phase structure, chemical stability, microstructure, and electrical properties are evaluated by the X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy, Raman spectroscopy and electrochemical testing.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All electrolytes reveal a cubic fluorite structure with an Fm-3m space group and remain excellent chemical stability at different atmospheres.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The grain size and density of ceramics increase significantly, and a large number of oxygen vacancies are created after alkaline earth metals incorporated into Nd2Ce2O7.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Generally, the total conductivity is associated with the number of oxygen vacancies and microstructure of ceramics.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrolyte of Nd(1.85)Mg(0.15)Ce2(O)7-delta exhibits the highest electrical conductivity of 0.923 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: S cm(-1) in dry air and wet 5% H-2-Ar atmosphere at 700 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionally, with alkaline earth metals doped Nd2Ce2O7 as electrolytes, the proton-conducting single cells have a better open circuit voltage and peak power density.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The single cell based on Nd(1.85)Mg(0.15)Ce2(O)7-delta electrolyte can reach 0.890 V and 483 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This was observed to stay constant without extreme degradation after short-term testing.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of divalent alkaline earth metals (Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) doped Nd2Ce2O7 electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells
